name: Minecraft Server File
summary: Learn about .MCSERVER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: You can create the MCSERVER file with MCServer Maker and open it with MCServer Runner. Both programs are available in the MCServer download.

description: Server package created and used by MCServer, an application that enables you to build and customize your own Minecraft server; contains several files, including .JAR, .COMMAND, .TXT, and .YML files, used to configure the server.
